name: Guardian Facade
flavorText: These designs show an elaborate garb central to the traditions of one ancient culture. Translated several times over, they describe a memorial held once a decade. It was a remembrance of one brave hero, who, in the grip of heartbreak, nearly delivered the world to evil.
